Spaceport Container Storage Key.recommendedRoute: Approach from the northeast side, use upper catwalks to avoid open sightlines.
Spaceport Container Storage Key.notes: Popular PvP hotspot; expect campers near the stairwell.

Dam Control Center Tower Key.recommendedRoute: Use the zipline from the south side to minimize exposure.
Dam Control Center Tower Key.notes: Good mid-game stop if youâ€™re rotating through the southeast dam area.

Stella Montis Archives Key.recommendedRoute: Enter from the west corridor, clear side rooms first, then push into the main archive hall.
Stella Montis Archives Key.notes: One of the best PvE loot rooms; worth prioritizing if you have the key.

Raider Hatch Key.recommendedRoute: Check your map for hatch locations.
Raider Hatch Key.notes: Can be purchased, crafted, quest reward, or looted from players. Used for quick extraction.

Dam Staff Room Key.notes: Unlocks a staff room near the Control Tower.

Dam Testing Annex Key.recommendedRoute: Southeastern corner of the Dam Battlegrounds.
Dam Testing Annex Key.notes: Use on one of two locked doors to loot the room.

Spaceport Ground Control Key.recommendedRoute: Control tower near center of the map, a little to the west.
